author: Farnaz Fassihi
title: U.N. Security Council Extends Arms Embargo on Yemen
text:
UNITED NATIONS—The U.N. Security Council extended an arms embargo on Yemen on Monday in a diplomatic victory for Russia, dealing a setback to a U.S.-backed resolution that called for action against Iran for allegedly violating that embargo.
Russia called the U.S.-backed resolution against Iran “politically charged” and uncorroborated and vetoed it, and then submitted its own without any mention of Iran, which the Council adopted.
...
